text: @AMErikaNGIRLLL @realDonaldTrump President of the United States retweeting Girl❤️Bot on Saturday of Memorial Day after playing golf all day.  Within 24 hours more than 100,000 Americans will have died from Coronavirus and this is how you spent your day.  Shameful.  So sad.
